GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.38 to before v5.10.132
GSD.description:
ARM: 9210/1: Mark the FDT_FIXED sections as shareable

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit d6cab2e06c33533d45586cb6161cdc9a754b29a1, it was introduced in version v5.10.38 by commit 1eb77569029da382924fda0f23ecaea8e10acac6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: 9210/1: Mark the FDT_FIXED sections as shareable
